{{cpp/numeric/math/binary_is|isgreater

|note=The built-in {{c/core|operator&gt;}} for floating-point numbers may set {{lc|FE_INVALID}} if one or both of the arguments is NaN. This function is a "quiet" version of {{c/core|operator&gt;}}.
